resources.string:
The rules:
 
1. Some answers will be multiple choice, some will be choose-correct-answers.
 
2. You will be asked to confirm your answer, then it will be submitted. Choose wisely!
 
3. For the choose-all-correct answers, you must choose ALL correct answers to earn a point.
 
4. When in doubt, choose C.
Complete the sentence:\n \nThe quick brown fox jumps over the lazy...
How many sides does a heptagon have?
Choose all numbers that are multiples of 4.
Choose all former emperors of the Byzantine Empire.
